title: delayed_dog_bedding_collection_evening
summary: Dog bedding was collected later than the usual routine time in the evening.
description: Dog bedding was collected later than the usual schedule (normally before 17:00) due to human oversight. At the time of collection, dew formation had not yet significantly increased. Environmental conditions are referenced from the nearby empty duck coop temperature and humidity record.

context.dew_status: not significant at time of collection

environment_reference.note: Referenced due to close time proximity and shared environmental conditions.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
